selectedVerses.text: Then they lifted up their voices and wept again. And Orpah kissed her mother-in-law, but Ruth clung to her.

He rose and struck down the Philistines until his hand was weary, and his hand clung to the sword. And the LORD brought about a great victory that day, and the men returned after him only to strip the slain.

from the nations concerning which the LORD had said to the people of Israel, "You shall not enter into marriage with them, neither shall they with you, for surely they will turn away your heart after their gods." Solomon clung to these in love.
Nevertheless, he clung to the sin of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, which he made Israel to sin; he did not depart from it.
While he clung to Peter and John, all the people ran together to them in the portico called Solomon's, astounded.
